MTrack

MTrack is an app that help you find your lost/misplaced mobile phone. This app can change your phones Ringer Mode (Silent - Normal), notify a predefined number if the SIM card of your device has changed and track your phones location through GPS or Cell towers. All of this can be achieved through SMS commands.

Setting up the App

It is vital that you fill out app settings properly, otherwise the app won\'t be able to function properly.

PASSWORD :-Enter a password for the application.DO NOT SHARE this password with anyone.

Friends Phone#:- This is the number the app uses to notify you when the sim card of the phone is changed.

Silent Mode Keyword :- This keyword is used for turning the silent mode ON.

Normal Mode Keyword :- This keyword is used for turning a SILENT device into NORMAL.

Get Location Mode Keyword :- This keyword is used for getting the GPS location of the device.

Using MTrack

1.Silent - Normal Switch
This option can be used if forgot where you put your silenced phone. Turn Ringer volume to maximum through a SMS.

Send your password [space] silent keyword to activate silent mode
Ex: 12345 silent

Send your password [space] Normal keyword to activate normal mode
Ex: 12345 normal

2.Get Location
This option will get you the GPS location of the device. (Location accuracy might not be 100% because of GPS signal strength, Cell tower density changes and Data connectivity)

Send your password [space]Get Location keyword to recive GPS coordinates
Ex: 12345 getloc

3.SIM change notification
This option will notify a predefined number if the current SIM card of your device to be changed. The App send a SMS to the predefined number( Friends #) from the new SIM card and you will able to identify the new number. You can perform all the above operations to that new number.

There is no SMS codes to this option.

Known Issues
On some devices "Location requests" can cause a crash.This happens becasue of low GPS signal strength
